name: NAS Telescope
description: This extension allows NAS gatherers to quickly add observations to The Observatory.
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://use.typekit.net; connect-src http://nasobservatory.co.uk/; style-src * 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data:; font-src 'self' https://use.typekit.net
